2025-09-05NRPublic Service Employment ActReappointment of the Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers' OmbudspersonReappointment of François Boileau of Montréal, Quebec, to be Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers' Ombudsperson, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective October 5, 2025.N/A
subject: Reappointment of the Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers' Ombudsperson
precis: Reappointment of François Boileau of Montréal, Quebec, to be Special Adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to be known as the Taxpayers' Ombudsperson, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective October 5, 2025.
